text: Babeere ng’omuddo ogumera waggulu ku nnyumba129:6 Obusolya bw’ennyumba z’omu Isirayiri zaalina ettaka waggulu ku zo eryali litabuddwamu evvu n’omusenyu. Enkuba bwe yatonnyanga, mwamerangamu omuddo, kyokka omuddo ogwo gwakalanga mangu ddala olw’omusana okugwakako kubanga emirandira gyagwo tegyagendanga wala wansi mu kasolya,
